+-----------------------+-----------------------+-----------------------+
| **Autolev**           | **SymPy**             | **Notes**             |
+=======================+=======================+=======================+
| ``Constants C+``      | ``c = sm.symbols(‘c’, | Refer to SymPy        |
|                       | real=True,            | :ref:`assumptions     |
|                       | nonnegative=True)``   | <assumptions_module>` |
|                       |                       | for more information. |
+-----------------------+-----------------------+-----------------------+
| ``Constants a{2:4}``  | ``a2, a3, a4 =        |                       |
|                       | sm.symbols('a2 a3 a4',|                       |
|                       | real=True)``          |                       |
+-----------------------+-----------------------+-----------------------+
